column1: especially under partition law, as it becomes a judgment in rem. In the case in
hand,  there  is  a  vast  difference  between  the  extent  of  land  sought  to  be
partitioned  and  the  land  which  was  surveyed  according  to  the  preliminary
survey. Thus, the investigation of the title and identity of the land sought to be
portioned  has  not  been  properly  considered  and  proved  in  this  case.  The
judgment entered in connection with the settlement becomes illegal and must
